title: No fullscreen option on VNC
author: bpsib
body_snippet: There's no fullscreen option when using VNC. Using the fullscreen (F11) option does NOT make it fullscreen. The toolbars are still there and can't do keyboard shortcuts such as alt+tab on remote computer. This makes it completely useless for me.
